events.comment:
MODIFY IMPORTANT VALUES IN SCENE VARIABLES
DO NOT TOUCH ANY OF THE VARIABLES NAMED "CHILD" AND A NUMBER

Start of a generation
Inits stuff that needs to be done before generation
also logs stats in the console

Generates food and random creatures on generation 1
generation 2 generates creatures based on the previous generation average, needs to be made better LOOL

If the creature senses food it will turn towards it
if the creature doesnt sense food it will try going towards the center
also moves the creature forward every frame
checks if food is eatable and eats it
Kills all creatures who have not eaten enough food after 20 seconds
it adds all the surviving creatures stats to an array

it takes all values in the array and makes an average from it using it for the next generation stats
once all of that is done it restarts the scene
Export data stuff, not that interesting
gamespeed upgrades although usually breaks simulation results if gamespeed is 16 or more

content.text: relaunch the game to make a new simulation

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: UploadDownloadTextFile
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Allows users to upload/download text content to a filename and vice versa.
description: Allows users to upload/download text content to a filename and vice versa.
(The current gdevelop only supports desktop version, this one is compatible with browsers)

[Open this example](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=https://resources.gdevelop-app.com/examples/extension-upload-download-text/extension-upload-download-text.json) to learn how to use this extension.

eventsFunctions.description: Upload a text file to text input.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Upload a text file to text input
eventsFunctions.name: UploadTextFile
eventsFunctions.sentence: Upload a text file to text input _PARAM1_
